Key Match Events: Paul DeJong hit a two-run homer
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was delayed for 2 hours, 14 minutes before resuming at 10:20 p.m.
Others: Kansas City improved to a league-best 23-13 since the All-Star break
Cleveland had led the division since April 14 but dropped the first three games in this series
Royals starter Michael Lorenzen left in the second after straining his left hamstring while covering first base
